entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING ENDED, Marystown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 3.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Winterland Branch Hill 10:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Temperature: 3.0°C

Humidity: 99 %

Wind: 17 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon.
entry.summary: Showers ending near noon then clearing. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to zero this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning and ending late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
